snippet: Representative Aaron Schock’s congressional office, racially charged comments by an aide and a real estate transaction put him in the spotlight.
abstract: Illinois Rep Aaron Schock, who ordinarily looks to draw attention by posing on Instagram, may face ethics inquiry after Washington Post reported that firm named Euro Trash donated his lavish decor found in his congressional office; Schock is also under fire for aide's racially offensive comments.

byline.contributor: David McKinney contributed reporting from Peoria, Ill. Kitty Bennett contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Representative Aaron Schock’s congressional office, racially charged comments by an aide and a real estate transaction put him in the spotlight.

headline.main: Aaron Schock, a Lawmaker Used to Attention, Draws a Little More Than He Wanted
headline.print_headline: A Lawmaker Used to Attention Draws a Little More Than He Wanted
